pkgmetadata.longdescription: # rmspaceRemove trailing whitespace from code and other plain-text files.## Usage```bashpip install rmspace# Remove trailing whitespace.python -m rmspace ./rmspace/rmspace/main.py# Remove trailing whitespace, return 1 if any file was formatted.# This is intended for linting in CI flows.python -m rmspace ./rmspace/rmspace/main.py --check```
